templates.name: DOC
templates.prompt_pattern: Document the following file: {file_path}. Include: purpose, key functions/exports, parameters, return types, and usage examples.

templates.name: FIX
templates.prompt_pattern: Fix the bug in {file_path}: {bug_description}. Show the root cause, apply the fix, and verify it doesn't break existing functionality.

templates.name: ANALYZE
templates.prompt_pattern: Scan {directory_or_file} for patterns related to: {pattern_type}. Identify all occurrences, document findings, and suggest improvements.

templates.name: CREATE
templates.prompt_pattern: Create a new {file_type} at {file_path} that implements {functionality}. Include proper error handling, documentation, and follow existing code patterns.

templates.name: TEST
templates.prompt_pattern: Write comprehensive tests for {file_path} covering: happy path, edge cases, error scenarios. Use existing test patterns in the codebase.
